post.desc:
Huh? **Sagume**... is a divine spirit? A shinrei. Wait, wait. What the hell is a shinrei to begin with? **Junko** is also classified a shinrei. And even **Kanako** is not a kami, but a shinrei.

[**Oh...**](https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Perfect_Memento_in_Strict_Sense/Divine_Spirit) they're gods for ghosts. Dead gods.

... ðŸ¤¨ So these three are dead?
